sen.j: 久我 清通（こが きよみち、明徳4年（1393年） - 享徳2年9月5日 (旧暦)（1453年10月7日））は室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Kiyomichi KOGA (1393-October 7, 1453) was a court noble in the Murmachi period.
Kiyomichi KOGA (1393-October 7, 1453) was a court noble in the Muromachi period.
Kiyomichi KOGA (1393 - October 16, 1453) was a Kugyo (high court noble) in the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: 1393-October 7, 1453 を1393 - October 17, 1453 に修正しました。court noble をKugyo (high court noble) に修正しました。

sen.e: His father was Michinobu KOGA.
His father was Michinobu KOGA.
His father was Michinobu KOGA.
Michihiro KOGA was his child.
Michihiro KOGA was his child.
Michihiro KOGA was his child.
His go (pen name) was Gokuze.
His go (pen name) was Gokuze.
His go (pen name) was Gokuze.

sen.j: 嘉吉元年11月2日に嘉吉の変で足利義教が暗殺された混乱に乗じて源氏長者の地位を申請して任ぜられる。
sen.e: He applied for and obtained the position as Genji choja (the top of the Minamoto clan), taking advantage of confusion caused by Kakitsu Incident as of November 2, 1441 in which Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assassinated.

He applied for and obtained the position of Genji choja (the top of the Minamoto clan), taking advantage of confusion caused by the Kakitsu Incident of November 2, 1441, in which Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assassinated.

He applied for and obtained the position of Genji no choja (chief of the Minamoto clan), taking advantage of confusion caused by the Kakitsu Incident of December 23, 1441, in which Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assassinated.
sen.cmt: the top of the Minamoto clan をGenji no choja (chief of the Minamoto clan) に修正しました。November 2 をDecember 23 に修正しました。

sen.j: だが、没後に足利義政が再び源氏長者に任じられたため、源氏長者の地位は再び足利将軍家に戻った。
sen.e: After his death, the position was regained by Ashikaga Shogun family as Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assigned to the position again.
After his death, the position was reclaimed by the Ashikaga Shogun family as Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assigned to the position again.
After his death, the position was reclaimed by the Ashikaga Shogun family as Yoshinori ASHIKAGA was assigned to the position again.

tit.cmt: Brief personal history をBrief Personal History に修正しました。

sen.j: 明徳4年（1393年）に久我通宣の子として生まれる。
sen.e: In 1993, he was born as the child of Michinobu KOGA.
In 1393, he was born as the child of Michinobu KOGA.
In 1393, he was born as the child of Michinobu KOGA.

sen.j: 永享元年（1429年）に内大臣（1429年 - 1432年）となる。
sen.e: In 1429, he became a minister of the center (1429 - 1432).
In 1429, he became a minister of the center (1429 – 1432).
In 1429, he became a Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1429 – 1432).
sen.cmt: minister of the center をNaidaijin (Minister of the Center) に修正しました。

sen.j: 嘉吉2年（1442年）1月5日 (旧暦)、叙従一位。
sen.e: On January 5, 1442, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
On January 5, 1442, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
On February 24, 1442, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: January 5 をFebruary 24 に修正しました。

sen.j: 享徳元年（1452年）に太政大臣（1452年 - 1453年）となる。
sen.e: In 1452, he became a Daijo-daijin (Grand minister of state) (1452-1453).
In 1452, he became a Daijo-daijin (Grand minister of state) (1452-1453).
In 1452, he became a Daijo daijin (Grand minister of state) (1452-1453).
sen.cmt: Daijo-daijin のハイフンを削除しました。

sen.e: In 1453, he passed away.
In 1453, he passed away.
In 1453, he passed away.
